page.title: 03Organisations
page.content: There are six Clubs and Organisations in this Block. {Brownies and Guides}meet on Wednesday evenings in the School. They start at 6.30 pm and finish at 7.30 pm. When they go in they have to give 20p to their leader and if they forget it they have to give 40p the next week.There are 15 girls in the Brownies and Guides, 10 Brownies and 5 Guides. {Boys Brigade}is held in the School on Tuesday evenings from 6.00pm till 7.15pm. There are 11 boys who are members aged from 7 to 11 years. They practice marching, do P.E. and play games. Their uniform is a blue jersey and trousers, with a blue hat. The Boys Brigade is a Christian organisation and it is run by the parish minister.
